textBeforeTable: openings Welcome, bridge friends. Please send comments to Liu, Hong LH Green Card A Simplified Version of LH Blue Card The Design considerations openings & Bids afterwards Contents: I believe that if promoted well, this Blue Card will be seen in the bridge world championships. This card is good for experienced players. If you just try it, you'll see the bright points of it. The testing with boards generator and real games approved that this Blue card has better chance of wining in competition comparing to SAYC or Precision. For the considerations of designing this convention card, please see "The Design considerations" Welcome, bridge friends.
